quote: Do not look for approval except for the consciousness of doing your best. – Andrew Carnegie
fact: One-fourth of the world`s population lives on less than $200 a year.  Ninety million people survive on less than $75 a year.
joke: Don't tell secrets in corn fields. Too many ears around.
